Dengeos Restaurant , Skokie 3301 Main St, Skokie, IL 60076 AVERAGE USER RATING Cuisine: Barbecue Restaurants Contact: (847) 677-7911 Visit Website View more information on Yahoo! User Reviews Reviews for Dengeos Restaurant: 17 AVERAGE OVERALL RATING Showing 1 - 10 of 17 Previous | 1 | 2 | Next Sort By: Most Recent Positive Negative Most Helpful USER RATING By John , 2/23/11 i have been to this establishment as a customer, and i have to say, why are people saying that the food is great. ITS NOT. the portions are small, for the price. Let me also say, that i really do believe that the staff do not take kindly to minority customers. I am a asian american, and i was disgusted by the treatment of one of their staff members. They seemed to be hostile, and not friendly toward myself. But the aora of this place did not seem right. I did not see much diversity among the customers. Something did not feel right in this place. I do believe that racism is still alive and well in 2011 Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By a b , 5/13/10 Kitchen crew needs to learn the difference between"NO TOMATOES", and"NO ONIONS", when someone orders a gyros! Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By George , 3/29/10 Really good Greek fast food restaurant. It's always packed with people. Great Greek salads!! Great Gyros!! Average Hot Dogs/Hamburgers. Stay with the Greek food. Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING Wide selection! By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/17/10 I love coming here. They have something for everyone in your family. Their menu contains gyros, pasta, beef, salad, and a catering service available. The food is excellent and the service is friendly! Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By sam , 11/29/09 We got sick from some not so fresh burgers and chicken sandwich Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem 0 of 1 Yahoo! Users found this review helpful USER RATING Good fast food By A Yahoo! Contributor , 10/2/09 The food and service are good here. There are quite a few food options, all moderately priced. I like the shrimp plate as well as the spinach pie - both very tasty! Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING Dengeos Restaurant is a great place for lunch or dinner By A Yahoo! Contributor , 8/28/09 I had a business lunch there and ordered the Greek Chicken and Gyros with Feta cheese. The food was wonderful. The cashier was very patient with us even when we were a bit indecisive. the food came quickly and it was the right temperature. The place seemed like it was recently remodeled. I had a very good experience. Best of all free refills Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By Gerard , 6/27/08 Great gyros, fries, service, very clean and efficient staff, nice restaurant as well. I'm happy that they're close to home.
A nice place to take the kids for a burger. Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By Ninodino , 1/18/08 Dengeos has a great variety of food. I especially like their soups and chicken kabobs!! YUMMY!! =) The only drawback is that Dengeos does not have a drive through and parking is really difficult. They should expend and provide more parking, otherwise, I highly recommend Dengeos!! Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By Dan , 11/7/07 Absolutely the best restaurant of its kind anywhere! Super Gyros, wonderful Italian beef and sausage. Great food at the right price. I've been eating there for over 30years. The owners have continually invested and reinvested money to make their business better. Was this review helpful?
